title: IConvertSolidFeatureData.OverrideDefaultAutoReliefParameters
description: Gets or sets whether to override the default sheet metal auto relief parameters such as relief type and relief ratio for this convert solid feature.
returns: True to override the default sheet metal auto relief parameters, false to not
remarks:
If this property is set to true, you can set:
IConvertSolidFeatureData::ReliefRatio
IConvertSolidFeatureData::ReliefType
